function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor and marginalized groups hit harder by the pandemic","Impact":"Broader social and economic damages for the poorest people and marginalized regions","Mitigation":"Special attention in designing and implementing post-pandemic recovery programs","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Poor and marginalized groups, migrant workers","Owner":"Government, aid organizations"},{"Description":"Extreme vulnerability of cities to global pandemic","Impact":"Risks to urban tourism, food, and environment systems","Mitigation":"Reconsidering the way urban systems are developed and governed","Technologies":"Urban planning and governance technologies","People":"City residents, tourists","Owner":"City governments, urban planners"},{"Description":"Need for better self-sufficiency and diverse economic structures","Impact":"Dependence on specific economic sectors, lack of resilience","Mitigation":"Paradigm shift towards diverse economic structures and self-sufficiency","Technologies":"Economic diversification strategies","People":"Local businesses, policymakers","Owner":"Local governments, economic development organizations"}]}
